message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $7,500 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go any lower than $8,500. This is still a good deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find the product worth every penny. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really close to my budget limit. I'm willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I'd love to make a deal, but I need to be careful with my finances.
